mapper.sql: permission_id, menu_id, permission, description, create_time, update_time, `valid`
mapper.insert:
insert into permission
menu_id,
permission,
description,
create_time,
update_time,
`valid`,

mapper.update:
update permission
menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`valid` = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update permission set menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `valid` = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT} where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT p.`permission_id` permissionId, p.`description` permissionName FROM permission p WHERE p.`menu_id`=#{menuId} AND p.`valid`=1
